name: Send SMS
description: Send an SMS to a phone with  Twilio

params.name: twilio.phoneNumber
params.description: Your Twilio phone number. The SMS will be sent with this number

params.name: twilio.accountSid
params.description: your Twilio account security Id, this is used in conjunction with a security code obtained from Twilio

params.name: twilio.authToken
params.description: Your Twilio Auth token issued from the Twilio App sign up process

params.name: twilio.toPhoneNumber
params.description: The number to send the SMS message to

params.name: twilio.message
params.description: The number to send the SMS message to
